name: Float and Gloat
description:
As the title says: float, win, gloat, repeat...

Just point your mouse on where you want to go. Meh, the game will teach you everything you need to know, just go play already.

Are you still reading this?

The game was made during a three day period for Slime Jam 2000. As a solo developer, I obviously made everything by myself.

Development Timelapse

Tools used:
  • Unity
  • Adobe Illustrator & Photoshop
  • Bfxr
  • SunVox

No Bill Murrays were harmed in the making of this game.
